title: Font on Everton FC's Jersey
content:
Hi, I wonder if someone can tell me what font this is please?

Cheers

Edo

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Everton jersey Font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111120832/http:/typophile.com/files/Everton%20jersey%20Font.png) | 108.24 KB |
author: edovelthuis

comments.content:
This one has been asked [before](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111120832/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34210).

It's the Premier League proprietary font (called Premier League!) and is used on all shirts (not just Everton's).

It's a custom design by [The Brand Union](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111120832/http:/thebrandunion.com/OurWork/CaseStudy/82/RevitalisingAGlobalBrand) (possibly when it was still Enterprise IG). Click on the flash and you can see all the letters. Also a very interesting project sketchbook to look at.

For those who want to take a closer look, see [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111120832/http:/www.premierleague.com/staticFiles/7a/71/0,,12306~94586,00.pdf).
